articles.title: Zack Snyder’s Netflix scifi epic Rebel Moon is a new way to make movies
articles.description: Rebel Moon, a massive sci-fi epic directed by Zack Snyder and coming to Netflix, will be a two-part movie with two different versions of each part.
articles.content: Original sci-fi universes are few and far between in Hollywood, so its no surprise that Zack Snyders latest blockbuster Rebel Moon is getting a lot of attention. Netflixs deep-space epic is set to be… [+2363 chars]
